sentences.en: At the last moment, Harry caught the Snitch for 150 points.
sentences.cn: 在最后的时刻, 哈里抓到了金色飞贼得到150分.

sentences.en: He has taken care of the girl who wanted to snitch.
sentences.cn: 他已经干掉要告密的女孩了。

sentences.en: I know you don't wanna a snitch.
sentences.cn: 我知道你不想成为告密者.

sentences.en: I managed to snitch abdul abdullah's breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我想办法把阿布·阿度拉偷到手.

sentences.en: Michael: Never snitch on a friend, KITT. Besides, he's right. It is my responsibility.
sentences.cn: 迈克: 永远别打朋友的小报告, 凯特. 再说他 说 得对, 那是我的责任.
答应我,一定不告发我行 吗 ?

sentences.en: They considered it a crime to snitch on one of their own group to the teacher.
sentences.cn: 他们认为向老师告自己的同伴的状是有罪的.

words.tran_cn: 管道涂层裂缝检测仪；告密者；小偷

trans.tran_en: to tell someone in authority about something that another person has done wrong, because you want to cause trouble for that person
